description:
Nozomi’s Zanpakuto breaks in the midst of trying to protect Genryusai from Kageroza’s attack. As Ichigo and Kon try to save Nozomi from being taken away, Kageroza reveals a shocking secret between him and Nozomi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le Reiatsu diminuant. Ichigo, lutte mortelle contre son âme
The Depleting Reiatsu! Ichigo, Death Struggle of the Soul!
Ushinawareru Reiatsu! Ichigo, Tamashii no Shitou!
失われる霊圧! 一護, 魂の死闘!
